mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Crosman, George H., Jr. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Crosman, George H., Jr.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: His Excellency the Governor Wheeling Aug 15 1861. By Telegraph from Grafton " " 1861. Mr. Pumphrey left for Clarksburg this morning will be in Wheeling tomorrow evening by order Brig Gen Kelley Geo H Crosman Jr A.A.G. 17gr56pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Crosman, George H., Jr.
Grafton, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
